channel.title: learn on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in learn on A Hugo website

item.title: SAS ADV into R
item.description: Chapter 10 Compare the symput and symputx difference, symput with x will give automatically removes leading zero and trailing blanks from the arguments. symget () SYMPUT routine create or update macro variables during DATA step execution. performs automatic numeric to character conversion on any numeric value that you attempt to assign to a macro variable. SYMGET obtain the value of a macro variable during the execution of a DATA step, a PROC SQL step, or an SCL program.

item.title: Exploratory Data Analyst (SQL)
item.description: Exploratory Data Analyst applies to the following cases: vague targets or problems to the large data set large data set needs cleaning Benefit of the exploratory data analyst: help find the inner pattern or relationship through the data help to categorize the variables for the further analysis. (missing, outlier etc.) Three type of data Numeric data We would like to know the min and max, average, variance and correlation and percentile to this type of data.

item.title: Meta Analysis
item.description: ref NOTE: most words are from the ref above, and it is a mini summary from my own perspective. Since I am truly not able to find the better word to describe. Meta Analysis is a method used the data results from individual studies. Studies are coming from computerized Literature Search of a database such as PudMed etc. The auto search are based on the participants, interventions, comparison and study designs indicated in the contrasts of the scientific papers.

item.title: Git help
item.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system. working directory. staging area(index). git repository. three different objects generate from git cmd and describe in Hash: blob: only save the content of the file instead the file name. tree: the file name. commit: the first commit also called root commit. git basic git init: generate a file called /.git/ used ls -a to see all the hided files.

item.title: SQL
item.description: DEFINATION OF RELATION TABLES HOW TO CHANGE THE ENTITY TO A SCHEMAS CASE WHEN SUBQUERY COMMON TABLE EXPRESS (cte) WINDOW FUN ROLLUP and CUBE TABLESAMPLE UNPIVOT:ROW TO COLUMN PIVOT:COLUME TO ROW Some information contains from Datacamp, you can use my refer to get started and learn new technique together. DEFINATION OF RELATION TABLES entity: (table) the object store the information attribute: column in a table to describe the part of the information
